I'm William Meldrum

I'm a recent Computer Science graduate (BS, Dec 2021) from the University of Utah with an unparalelled passion for computer graphics. I'm currently working with Motorola Solutions to create a cloud-based 911 dispatcher application. In my free time I enjoy playing Street Fighter competitively and spoiling my three cats with my wife.
